title: Twentieth century focus: health hazards. Part 3. Drugs
creator_credit: Gordon Croton and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Attempts to present a factual picture of drug-taking in Britain today. It deals with the extent of addiction, the social and medical effects, the legal situation, examines attempts being made to confront the problem.
